radiographic_examinations.findings: Worsening atelectasis at the lung bases bilaterally, possible superimposed consolidation, no pleural effusions. The liver shows homogeneous enhancement with no focal hepatic mass. Air is within the intra and extrahepatic biliary tree from recent ERCP. A small multi lobulated rim enhancing fluid collection identified in the gallbladder fossa measuring approximately 3.9 x 1.3 cm with small to moderate inflammatory fat stranding in the vicinity. No peripancreatic abnormality. Normal spleen, adrenal glands, and urinary system with no dilatation of the renal collecting system. Enlarged prostate gland measuring 5.1 x 3.9 cm. No lymphadenopathy or abdominal aortic aneurysm identified. Moderate atherosclerotic disease noted in the abdominal aorta. No acute osseous lesions.
